title: What is the name of #0 Apostle on Dawning
body:
Dawning Continent is coming now, what's your favorite name of the #0 Apostle with very good talent?

Here are the alternative lists:

1. Leona/蕾欧娜
The name is from one champion in League of Legends which is known as the Radiant Dawn.
This name is corresponding to the name of the Dawning Continent.
蕾欧娜是英雄联盟中曙光女神的名称，符合拂晓（黎明）大陆的名称。
黎明就在眼前。 —蕾欧娜


2. Ragnaros/拉格纳罗斯
The name is from one character in the World of Warcraft universe, it is the Firelord, is the tenth and final boss of Molten Core.
This name is corresponding to the background of the Dawning Continent.
拉格纳罗斯是魔兽世界宇宙中的火焰领主，它被黑铁矮人召唤出来后给黑铁矮人带来了灭顶之灾，与拂晓大陆背景故事相关。
死吧，虫子。 —拉格纳罗斯

3. Abel/亚伯
The name is from the Holy Bible, which is the son of Adam and Eve.
This name is corresponding to the previous naming rule. (Adam for Atlantis, Eve for Byzantine)
亚伯是亚当和夏娃的孩子，符合以往大陆0号使徒的命名规则。


4. Balder/巴德尔
The name is from the Norse Mythology, which is Light personified. Ragnarok came after his death.
The name is corresponding to the name and background of the Dawning Continent.
巴德尔是北欧神话中的光明之神，诸神黄昏在他死后来临，符合拂晓大陆的名称和背景故事。


5. Sol/苏尔
The name is Sun personified in Germanic mythology.
The name is corresponding to the name of the Dawning Continent.
苏尔是日耳曼神话中的太阳神，驾驶太阳车与妹妹月亮神玛尼在天空中交替运行。
author: 0xa1511E5C683A007056CAa1d9A8D6A37464826280
